plot: Luis goes out one morning and finds that all small change given in shops and bars has been replaced by gifts and goods because there are no more coins.
title: Por un puñado de duros
plot_es: Luis goes out one morning and finds that all small change given in shops and bars has been replaced by gifts and goods because there are no more coins.
plot_en: Luis goes out one morning and finds that all small change given in shops and bars has been replaced by gifts and goods because there are no more coins.
